name: IT_Dimension
description:
IT-Dimension is a software development and consulting company which specializes on cross-platform and mobile software. Our main areas of competence are the design of the medium-to-large scale software systems and creation of portable applications in C++, mobile applications and services for Android, iOS (iPhone/iPod/iPad), Windows Phone and Windows 8.
During more than 7 years of our company existence we implemented several hundreds of software producs of different types (Desktop, Mobile software, Web-services, SaaS, RIA, mobile clients for existing Web-sites etc.)Â We also continue development of our own product: DigitalMoo Interactive Entertainment System (see http://digitalmoo.com for more details)
